replies.body: Dark Harvest is fucking broken, fix this shit hole Riot!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

has there been a change in timing to when abilities, sums and items can be cast after being heavily cc'd? I've noticed more than a few times on at least four different champions since the patch was launched that i was no longer able to cast either an ability, summoner spell or item after being cc'd when before i could, at first i thought it was just me but I've tested it on different champs and different items, abilities and spells, the cooldown from when you are cc'd to when you can use your kit again seems to have been changed to last longer than what you are actually cc'd for

Riot has really done it this time. They've given us a party of all the champions that have had a trillion modern skins. All these champions except Lulu should invite Ahri, Yi and Caitlyn to the party.
What if you execute yourself 5 times? Will the base kill gold against you stay low for the rest of the game, even if you do get killstreaks?
so many changes...but my RP is gon be gone for them pajama guardian skins

personaly i have hated the knew rune system from day one.then slowly after some time thought oh this aint so bad.now u removed chrysilas all tanks seem garbage and have very low health begining game.i wish riot had left the original runes and masteries in place they were great.alot of people i play with feel as i do and we beleive riot do as they want not  what the summoners want at all.i started playing lol on na b4 oce was here and have seen many changes.also i have not received a clash banner for participation as advertised win or lose and sent reports ..why?we still cant honer more than 1 freind or honer a enemy why?original champs tha have been modifyed into new champs why? swain xin maokia galio why cant we have both to choose from?
leona in the lore is a sun person who likes the sun *skin lunar eclipse*  me excuse me wtf {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
